summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Quiz Bot application. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend mostly working with minor UI interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Next question button not appearing after answer submission

integration_issues.issue: Clipboard write permission denied in browser automation (security limitation)
Webpack dev server overlay intercepting pointer events

passed_tests: Landing page loads with quiz and math cards
Quiz game navigation and question display
Question generation (quiz, math calc, equation, puzzle)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix next question button visibility after answer submission. Investigate webpack dev server overlay issue that may be blocking UI interactions.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed), Frontend: 85% (most features working, minor UI issues)
